divs: Sighting DetailsEro in cucina con la mia famiglia, finestre aperte e tapparelle abbassate, era estate. Abbiamo sentito forti vibrazioni e un rumore strano. Subito dopo abbiamo osservato dalle tapparelle una luce intensa. Abbiamo poi sollevato le tapparelle ma l'oggetto era gi��� sparito. Mio cugino che abitava nello stesso palazzo ��� salito sulla terrazza dove si poteva osservare il cielo a 360 gradi ma l'oggetto era gi��� sparito. I quotidiani locali hanno riportato la notizia. L'oggetto ��� stato avvistato in tutta la Sardegna. I was in the kitchen with my family, open windows and shutters closed, it was summer. We heard a strange noise and heavy vibration. Soon after we saw a bright light from the blinds. We then raised the blinds, but the object was gone. My cousin who lived in the same building went up on the terrace where could watch the sky at 360 degrees but the object was gone. Local newspapers reported the news. The object was spotted all over Sardinian island.
Summary: Rumori, vibrazioni forti, luce intensa. Elmas primi anni novanta. Noise, strong vibration, bright light. Elmas early nineties.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elmas
This sighting has been favorited 3 times.
